thread.title: Rebecca Thomson
thread.title_full: Nelson Alexander reviewed by Rebecca Thomson

author: Rebecca Thomson
title: Rebecca Thomson
text: We live oversees and have trusted our property management with Sarah Lunardi for some time now. She is outstanding. Sarah goes above and beyond in ensuring our property is well maintained and leased. Sarah has assisted us across many areas organising; insurance claims, contractors, leasing the properties to name a few. We feel confident and reassured that Sarah is managing our properties in Australia. She and Nelsons came to us through a recommendation from another agent in Brighton and we're delighted wth the service and professionalism we've encountered. I would highly recommend Sarah and the Nelson team.
